about_the_game:
Rich Skills:

More than 10 unique cat characters, each with special abilities.

Fast-paced, satisfying combat:

Block, perfect dodge, combos, executions, air combos, downward slashes, plus Boss moves coached by real-life fighters.

Diverse Exploration:

Chinese-themed puzzles offering knowledge, designed to avoid frustrating progress blocks.

Various levels: Sky, underground, sea, jungle, snow, underwater, with traps, puzzles, and jump challenges.

64 Achievements: Complete cat collection, exploration, skills, boss battles, hidden challenges, no-damage challenges, speedruns...

64 Collection Tasks: Hidden mice...

Special Soundtrack:

Boss moves and music work in sync.

Twist-filled, touching storyline:

A story about redemption and love, sacrifice, reunion, and friendship—explore the meaning of love in an adventurous journey.

Humorous and light-hearted:

Funny enemies with unexpected ways to defeat them.

Diverse Enemies:

Mutated creatures, evil hunters, spirits...

Hand-drawn Quality:

Detailed graphics utilizing GPU capabilities, interactive plants and animals.

A Story of Love:

A girl saves a cat, loses her life, and is resurrected by cats who share their lives with her. She forms a bond with the cats and embarks on an adventure. The planet is under threat from a mysterious organization. The cats’ journey involves overcoming environmental destruction, making allies, and discovering treasures.

Girl and Cats. Nature Guardian. Forest Protector. Puzzle Adventure. Mysterious Exploration. Action Adventure. Metroidvania Style. Heartwarming Storyline. Impactful Combat. Action. Blocking. Infinite Aerial Combo. Aerial Combo. Aerial Slash Combo. Multiple Cat Characters. Rescue Animals. Hand-drawn Art. Breathtaking Visuals. Platformer

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Lion 10.7, or later.
  • Processor: Intel Mac
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics or better
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X Lion 10.7, or later.
  • Processor: Intel Mac
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics or better
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

name: FreeCat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.00 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics or better
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 10 or later.
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.00 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX750
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: ［Features］Girl + 10 cats with unique skills. ［Action］Blocking, aerial combos,bosses trained with real kung fu fighter. ［Puzzle］Chinese puzzles. ［Art］Maps: Sky, Underground, Ocean, Jungle, Snow. ［Metroidvania］64+ achievements/quests. ［Fun］Funny enemies. ［Story］Plot twists
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Danish, Indonesian, Greek, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Arabic, Korean
*languages with full audio support
